item.title: SANS Offensive Operations CTF - Pwn Writeup
item.description: SANS Offensive Operations CTF This was a challenge in the pwn category of the SANS Offensive Operations 2024 CTF. This is a writeup for the challenge “Warmup Pwn”. Unfortunately, I did not take any screenshots or save the challenge files so I’ll mainly be walking through what I did and the script I made. Warmup Pwn - First Look The challenge tells us to connect using nc warmup.pwn.site 5005. They provide us with two files: target and libc-2.
